description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) is to improve revenue management, and local service delivery nationwide and in the education sector in Selected Regions.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Accounting information management system three (3) months after the Effective da | Description :Schedule 2,Section V, 3 By no later than three (3) months after the Effectiveness Date, the Recipient shall have installed an accountinginformation management system satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :01-Feb-2017

Finance Agreement :Establishment of a Procurement complaint handling mechanism | Description : Schedule 2, Section III, EBy nolater than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall have established a procurement complaint handlingmechanism acceptable to the Association. | Due Date :01-Feb-2017

Finance Agreement :External auditor | Description :Schedule 2, Section V, 1 By no later than six (6) months after the EffectiveDate, the Recipient shall recruit an external auditor pursuant to terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date:01-May-2017

Finance Agreement :Qualified accountant and a procurement assistant six (6) months after the Effect | Description :Schedule 2,Section V, 2 By no later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall recruit a qualified accountant and aprocurement assistant at the PREA Coordination unit pursuant to terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date:01-May-2017

title.narrative: C1-3. Number of revenue offices that have been subject to external evaluation of their performance contracts/program

actual.value: 8 revenue offices have signed their performance contracts

title.narrative: C1-5. Establishment of a single administrative identification number

target.value: Publication of quarterly data matching analysis between customs, tax and pension fund

actual.value: Partially met : the structure of the new ID for Legal entities is available

title.narrative: C4-2. High/substantial risks audits completed by Internal Audit Departments
C3.1 - Share of schools targeted by the component with an operational FEFFI, planning and implementing PECs
C4-3. Semiannual public debates on the budget law, the performance of revenue agencies and project performance led by CSOs.
PDO 1- Increased tax revenue collection (Domestic tax revenue/GDP ratio)
C2-2. Improved recovery of revenue (not including grants) by local governments
C1-2. Increased rate of confirmed suspicious customs transactions related to home use in selected Custom Office (in case of physical examination).

target.value: 20% in combined ports of Toamasina, Ivato, Fort Dauphin, Majunga, Tuléar

title.narrative: C3-2. Percentage of FRAM teachers in the areas selected by the component receiving subsidies with less than two months of delay
PDO 2 - Number of TADAT PO-8 indicators "Efficient Revenue Management" rated B (Text, Custom)
C2-1. Improved timeliness of service-delivery fiscal transfers to local governments

baseline.value: No standard available to measure acceptable delays for transfer execution

target.value: Completion of transfers of all investment and operating grants to communes by July 2021

actual.value: Transfer of Operating grants effective by August 2020

title.narrative: C1-1. Modernization of the Integrated Tax Administration System (ITAS)

target.value: Publication of external ITAS performance Audit report.

actual.value: ITAS performance Audit initiated with a drafted ToR elaborated

title.narrative: C4-1. Timely availability of the Court of Acccount (CA) public report (process indicator)

target.value: Yes, 8 months after the end of considered FY

actual.value: Yes, less than 12 months after the end of considered FY

title.narrative: PDO 5 - Number of female beneficiaries participating into public debates
PDO 3 - Share of communes undertaking an IGL self-assessment published on government public service delivery performance website

baseline.value: IGL self assessment tool not available

target.value: 400 communes undertake their IGL self assessment and publish it

title.narrative: PDO 4 - Publication of a Human resource management report within the Ministry of Education

target.value: Online publication of HRM dashboard by school and by teacher on a quarterly basis within 15 days of the start of each quarter

actual.value: Education's HRM dashboard publicly available online

title.narrative: C1-6. Improved formal registration of small and individual businesses
